text: Hammer of the Witch is the sixth studio album by the American hardcore band Ringworm. The album was released in 2014 on Relapse Records, their first studio album for the label. The album charted at No. 14 on the Billboard Heatseekers Albums chart and No. 21 on the Billboard Hard Rock Albums chart. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2014 albums Category:Ringworm (band) albums Category:Relapse Records albums
title: Hammer of the Witch
